name: neardevhub-widgets
description: NEAR DevHub widgets for NEAR Social

scripts.bw:build:instance: npm run bw build instances/$npm_config_instance build/$npm_config_instance && mv build/$npm_config_instance/src/widget/* build/$npm_config_instance/src/ && rm -Rf build/$npm_config_instance/src/widget
scripts.dry-run:devhub: npm run bw:build:devhub && cd ./build/devhub.near && bos components diff devhub.near network-config mainnet
scripts.deploy:infrastructure: npm run bw:build:infrastructure && cd ./build/infrastructure-committee.near && bos components deploy
scripts.dry-run:infrastructure: npm run bw:build:infrastructure && cd ./build/infrastructure-committee.near && bos components diff infrastructure-committee.near network-config mainnet
scripts.deploy:events: npm run bw:build:events && cd ./build/events-committee.near && bos components deploy
scripts.dry-run:events: npm run bw:build:events && cd ./build/events-committee.near && bos components diff events-committee.near network-config mainnet

author: Near Inc <hello@nearprotocol.com>
